text: Sugbon nigba ti ododo de ba won lati odo Wa, won wi pe: "Ki ni ko je ki Won fun un ni iru ohun ti Won fun (Anabi) Musa?" Se won ko si sai gbagbo ninu ohun ti A fun (Anabi) Musa siwaju bi? Won wi pe: “Opidan meji t’o n ranra won lowo (ni won).” Won si tun wi pe: “Dajudaju awa je alaigbagbo ninu ikookan (won).”
